actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO nc_3vr7___smsRegex (smsSender, smsRegex, sampleSms, discardSms, hasBalance, accountType, messageType, mc1, mc2, mc3, mc4, mc5, mc6, mc7, mc8, dateFormats, transactionType)
  VALUES ('{{smsSender.text}}', '{{smsRegex.text.replace("\\",'\\\\')}}', '{{sampleSms.text}}', {{discardSms.isSwitchedOn ? 1 : 0}}, {{hasBalance.isSwitchedOn ? 1 : 0}}, '{{accountType.selectedOptionValue}}', '{{messageType.selectedOptionValue}}', '{{mc1.selectedOptionValue}}', '{{mc2.selectedOptionValue}}', '{{mc3.selectedOptionValue}}', '{{mc4.selectedOptionValue}}', '{{mc5.selectedOptionValue}}', '{{mc6.selectedOptionValue}}', '{{mc7.selectedOptionValue}}', '{{mc8.selectedOptionValue}}', '{{formatsForDate.selectedOptionValues.join('@')}}', '{{transactionType.selectedOptionValue}}');
